title: Verify: SongScript uses Convex user deletion pattern
description: Verify SongScript can implement the complete user deletion mutation using the pattern from ralphtools Convex skill.

acceptanceCriteria.text: In SongScript, create admin:deleteUserAndAllData mutation following the pattern
Mutation deletes from: users, wordProgress, userSongProgress, lineProgress
Mutation deletes from: userWishlist, userPracticeLog, userGoals, userPreferences
Mutation handles Better Auth tables (user, session, account)
Test: Create test user, add progress data, delete user, verify all data gone
Test: npx convex run admin:deleteUserAndAllData works from CLI
Return deletion counts for each table
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
